author: Chris Kahn
title: U.S. men less likely to heed health warnings as coronavirus death toll mounts: Reuters/Ipsos poll
description: As America converts itself into a nation of shut-ins, one group appears to be less interested than others in following the ever-lengthening list of health tips aimed at slowing the spread of the coronavirus pandemic: men.
content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - As America converts itself into a nation of shut-ins, one group appears to be less interested than others in following the ever-lengthening list of health tips aimed at slowing the spread of the coronavirus pandemic: men.
